name: pm5.21

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| wi(wn(w0), wi(wn(w1), wb(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wn(w0), wn(w1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| wi(wn(w0), wi(wn(w1), wb(w0, w1)))

comment: Two propositions are equivalent if they are both false. Theorem *5.21 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 124. (Contributed by NM, 21-May-1994.)
